credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
dimensions:
H x Diam: 16.2 x 16.2 cm (6 3/8 x 6 3/8 in.)
Diam (top): 12.7 cm (5 in.)
title: Vase
description: Buff clay body, thrown.  Tapering cylindrical body, curving inward, no foot, straight rim, 3 applied curved handles.  Decorated in three panels divided by buff-colored branches.  Band at top below cobalt rim and band at bottom above cobalt band.  Pine cones in buff, outlined in blue against washy blue background.  Handles "washed" in blue.  High glaze allover.  Interior and base glazed.
name: Vase
